summary.name: Ayush Jain
summary.title: Leader, Architect
summary.personalSummary: Engineering leader with 10+ years driving impactful product and technology outcomes across startups and MNCs. Delivered intelligent, robust, resilient, secure and LLM-enabled systems. Blend of generalist adaptability and deep specialist expertise, excelling in strategic, high‑impact roles. Proven record of leading cross‑functional initiatives that accelerated technical and business growth.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.team: My team owned M365 Copilot and M365 Office Home, both Web and Native Apps.
experience.role: Led the team on M365 security initiatives, strengthened user data privacy, critical role in launching first-versions of M365 Copilot.
achievements: Product Launches & Innovation: Launched M365 Copilot, top-priority of Satya Nadella; owned backend, worked corss-teams for on‑time delivery, grew to 1M MAU.
Launched M365 Copilot across 2 sovereign clouds within 1.5 months, by leading a team of 2-devs.
Built OS‑level Copilot voice‑and‑vision prototype (inspired by Rewind.ai) as part of Microsoft Hackathon (FHL).
Privacy & Security Engineering: 20% faster auth by upgrading to secure, performant protocols like PFT‑PoP & OBO, and optimized token‑caching/claims validation.
Led 8-dev team, drove criticals, delivered 245 security tasks in 2 months across 15 KPIs and multiple cloud environments.
Fixed GDPR issues & enhanced privacy safeguards in user‑data flows, coordinating cross‑team to ensure E2E compliance.
Operational Excellence: Lowered false alerts by 20%, on‑call-dev TAT by 50%, by revamping monitor logic and improving SoPs, leading a team of 4-devs.
Improved documentation quality with 11 new technical video-docs, boosting team onboarding and cross‑knowledge transfer.
Reduced setup time by 30% by automating sovereign‑cloud infra provisioning via ARM templates for new EU sov-clouds setup.
Leadership & Mentorship: Hired and doubled the dev-count to 80. 2-peer-promotions, achieved through active mentorship to juniors and peer support.
Drove impactful action-items increasing 10% dev-productivity, by alignment on security standards, AI integration, and best practices.
Actively shaped Copilot’s use in my team and org, providing high‑value feedback as a power user to help shape AI usage and policies.
Improved dev-productivity by 10% by adding AI‑powered code-review bot, issue-delegation bot, and some workflow bots.

Launched 8+ products handling 20k+ DAU and 300+ daily purchases.
Engineering Leadership & Delivery: Led teams for 13+ major features, conducted & took 270+ interviews, mentored 8 engineers (6 promoted), and grew the team from 2 → 40.
Increased onboarding efficiency by 30% through documentation & playbooks.
Ran bi‑weekly tech sessions, sprint planning & retrospectives, maintained stakeholder alignment to sustain productivity.
Product Growth & Conversions: Drove payments (integrations with Juspay/Razorpay/PayU) and dynamic-gateway-switching (raising conversion by 5%).
Reduced EMI drop‑offs by 8% and boosted renewal-conversions by 5%.
Enabled experimentation & funnels (Firebase, MoEngage, customer interviews), improving conversions by 10–60% across plans, payments, and customer contexts.
Simplified waiting periods, drove an additional 5% conversion.
Boosted product-launch-efficiency by 30-60% through automation.
Customer Ops & Compliance: Automated refunds (boosted agent-productivity 5%) and improved UI & APIs for endorsements & purchases (additional 5% agent-productivity).
Enhanced serviceability & visibility (5% fewer customer-requests, +5% agent-productivity).
Represented tech in IRDAI audits and drove security compliance (WAF rules, repo/API checks).
Systems & Reliability: Enabled 10x scalability with 20% infra cost reduction.
Strengthened system reliability via Resilience4j (circuit breakers/retries).
Achieved 80% test coverage, integrated monitoring (Grafana, Prometheus, PagerDuty) for debugging and readiness.
Jointly created ticket-management-system based on real-time, customer-chat and agent-assignment with bot-support.
Designed and implemented ticketing-workflows for the home-loans team.
Nurtured the system growth to handle 20k tickets a day.
